mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wvp_user_api_key (user_id, app, api_key, expired_at, remark, enable, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{app}, #{apiKey}, #{expiredAt}, #{remark}, #{enable}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT uak.id, uak.user_id, uak.app, uak.api_key, uak.expired_at, uak.remark, uak.enable, uak.create_time, uak.update_time, u.username AS username FROM wvp_user_api_key uak LEFT JOIN wvp_user u on u.id = uak.user_id WHERE uak.id = #{id}
